trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Canton
There were no other sightings in Canton on or around March 23rd 2010
Summary: 3 lights that formed a triangle that was hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving with 2 of my friends. Al the sudden my friend that was in the back seat said " i think im looking at a ufo", then my other friend said " i've been looking at it for 2 minutes now! what is that?" i said where? where? where? i wanna see it. i finally seen it as i was swerving all over the road as i was looking for it. It was 3 lights in the shape of a triangle, simply not moving. They were just sitting in the sky. So i decided to race toward it after we were looking at it for about 5 minutes, and as soon as i turned down a road that went towards where the ufo was, it jetted off into the horizon,(after it wasnt moving for about 5 minutes).
